name: Actionauts
overview: The object of Actionauts is to program your robot to perform a series of commands. Use the joystick to set the commands to make the robot walk through a path. On the Commodore 64, you can alter the grid to change the path, the programming is mainly done on the same page and you can select from four robot designs. This game was published in multiple magazine with games included formats including Loadstar #021, Ahoy! 1986/04 (Issue #28), and Stonysoft #0649.
